alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stonington, or 12 miles southwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsh and Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
